trans-unit.source: Provides methods to serialize and deserialize tracking profiles into and from XML documents by using the tracking profile XML schema definition (XSD).
trans-unit.target: Fornece métodos para serializar e desserializar os perfis de rastreamento em e de documentos XML usando o perfil de rastreamento de definição de esquema XML (XSD).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The TrackingProfileSerializer uses the tracking profile XSD contained in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Schema%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to serialize <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> objects into valid XML documents and to deserialize valid XML documents into <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> objects.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]O TrackingProfileSerializer usa o perfil de rastreamento XSD contido em <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Schema%2A?displayProperty=fullName>para serializar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>objetos em documentos XML válidos e desserializar os documentos XML válidos em <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>objetos.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Schema%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The TrackingProfileSerializer performs validation during both serialization and deserialization and, if necessary, throws an appropriate exception.
trans-unit.target: O TrackingProfileSerializer executa validação durante a serialização e desserialização e, se necessário, gera uma exceção apropriada.

trans-unit.source: An XML document provides a convenient format in which to store a tracking profile.
trans-unit.target: Um documento XML fornece um formato conveniente para armazenar um perfil de rastreamento.

trans-unit.source: It also provides a non-programmatic way of authoring tracking profiles.
trans-unit.target: Ele também fornece uma maneira não programáticos de criação de perfis de rastreamento.

trans-unit.source: The out-of-box <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> uses a TrackingProfileSerializer to serialize and deserialize the tracking profiles that are stored in its database.
trans-unit.target: O out-of-box <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>usa um TrackingProfileSerializer para serializar e desserializar os perfis de rastreamento são armazenados no banco de dados.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Deserializes the XML document that is contained in the text reader by using the tracking profile XML Schema definition (XSD).
trans-unit.target: Desserializa o documento XML que está contido no leitor de texto usando o perfil de rastreamento de definição de esquema XML (XSD).

trans-unit.source: Deserialization refers to the process of creating an object from a well-formed XML document.
trans-unit.target: Desserialização refere-se ao processo de criação de um objeto de um documento XML bem formado.

trans-unit.source: Deserialize uses the tracking profile XSD contained in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Schema%2A> to deserialize the XML document that is contained in the text reader into a valid <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
trans-unit.target: Desserializar usa o controle de perfil XSD contida <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Schema%2A>ao desserializar o documento XML que está contido no leitor de texto em <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> válido</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Schema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Validation on the XML document is performed during deserialization, and, if the document is not valid, a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: O documento XML para a validação é executada durante a desserialização, e, se o documento não for válido, um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException>é gerada.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException>

trans-unit.source: You can catch this exception and examine <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException.ValidationEventArgs%2A> to determine the cause of the validation error.
trans-unit.target: Você pode pegar essa exceção e examinar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException.ValidationEventArgs%2A>para determinar a causa do erro de validação.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException.ValidationEventArgs%2A>

trans-unit.source: If there are any unhandled exceptions while deserializing the tracking profile then the workflow instance for which the tracking profile was requested will be terminated.
trans-unit.target: Se houver qualquer exceção não tratada ao desserializar o perfil de rastreamento a instância de fluxo de trabalho para o qual o perfil de rastreamento foi solicitado será encerrada.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you want to perform validation without deserializing the XML representation of a tracking profile, you can write your own tracking profile validator.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se você deseja executar a validação sem desserializar a representação XML de um perfil de rastreamento, você pode escrever seu próprio controle validador de perfil.

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Schema%2A> property for more information.
trans-unit.target: Consulte o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Schema%2A>propriedade para obter mais informações.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Schema%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.TextReader> that contains an XML document.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.IO.TextReader>que contém um documento XML.</xref:System.IO.TextReader>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref> that contains the deserialized tracking profile.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"> </xref> que contém o perfil de rastreamento desserializado.

trans-unit.source: reader is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: readeré uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: reader does not contain a document that conforms to the tracking profile XSD.
trans-unit.target: readernão contém um documento que está de acordo com o perfil de rastreamento de XSD.

trans-unit.source: Gets the tracking profile XML schema definition (XSD).
trans-unit.target: Obtém o controle de perfil de definição de esquema XML (XSD).

trans-unit.source: This property exposes the tracking profile XSD used by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer> to perform serialization and deserialization of a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade expõe o perfil de rastreamento XSD usado pelo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer>para realizar a serialização e desserialização de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer>

trans-unit.source: You may also use this property to get the tracking profile XSD in order to write your own validator for tracking profiles.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar essa propriedade para obter o perfil de rastreamento de XSD para gravar seu próprio validador para perfis de controle.

trans-unit.source: For example, you may want to do this in order to validate XML representations of tracking profiles without performing deserialization.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, convém fazer isso para validar as representações de perfis de controle sem realizar a desserialização.

trans-unit.source: The tracking profile XSD.
trans-unit.target: O perfil de rastreamento de XSD.

trans-unit.source: Serializes the tracking profile into an XML document by using the tracking profile XML Schema definition (XSD).
trans-unit.target: Serializa o perfil de rastreamento em um documento XML usando o perfil de rastreamento de definição de esquema XML (XSD).

trans-unit.source: Serialization refers to the process of creating a well-formed XML document from a valid <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
trans-unit.target: Serialização refere-se ao processo de criação de um documento XML bem formado de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> válido

trans-unit.source: Serialize uses the tracking profile <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Schema%2A> to serialize the tracking profile.
trans-unit.target: Serializar usa o perfil de rastreamento <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Schema%2A>para serializar o perfil de rastreamento.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Schema%2A>

trans-unit.source: `profile` must be a valid <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> that contains at least one valid track point.
trans-unit.target: `profile`deve ser um válido <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>que contém pelo menos um ponto de controle válido.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>

trans-unit.source: Validation on the tracking profile is performed during serialization, and, if the tracking profile is not valid, an <xref:System.ArgumentException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: O perfil de rastreamento para a validação é executada durante a serialização, e, se o perfil de rastreamento não é válido, um <xref:System.ArgumentException>é gerada.</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: You can catch this exception and examine its message property to determine the cause of the validation error.
trans-unit.target: Você pode pegar essa exceção e examinar sua propriedade de mensagem para determinar a causa do erro de validação.

trans-unit.source: If there are any unhandled exceptions while serializing the tracking profile, then the workflow instance for which the tracking profile was requested is terminated.
trans-unit.target: Se houver qualquer exceção não tratada ao serializar o perfil de rastreamento, a instância de fluxo de trabalho para o qual o perfil de rastreamento foi solicitado é encerrada.

trans-unit.source: A valid <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A valid <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> that holds the XML document.
trans-unit.target: Quando este método retorna, contém um <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>que contém o documento XML.</xref:System.IO.TextWriter>

trans-unit.source: The parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro é passado não inicializado.

trans-unit.source: profile is .
trans-unit.target: profileis .

trans-unit.source: -or- writer is .
trans-unit.target: -or- writer is .

trans-unit.source: profile is not a valid tracking profile.
trans-unit.target: profilenão é um perfil de rastreamento válida.
